news.title: Trump set to name replacements at the Fed and Bureau of Labor Statistics in coming days
news.summary: Both spots opened up Friday through the resignation of Fed Governor Adriana Kugler and the firing of Erika McEntarfer at the BLS.

news.title: Swiss tensions run high as clock ticks on U.S. tariff deadline
news.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump last week said he would impose 39% tariffs on Swiss goods starting later this week. The Swiss government says it is preparing for a possible trade war with the United States.

news.title: Berkshire shares dip after earnings decline, lack of buybacks disappoint investors
news.summary: Berkshire Hathaway writes down its Kraft Heinz stake. The move was a big write-down for Berkshire's underperforming Kraft HeinZ stake.

news.title: Legal AI startup Harvey hits $100 million in annual recurring revenue
news.summary: Harvey launched in 2022 after the founders experimented with OpenAI's large language model GPT-3, which came out before its viral AI chatbot, ChatGPT.

news.title: More than 3,000 Boeing defense workers go on strike after rejecting contract
news.summary: Boeing defense workers go on strike. More than 3,000 Boeing defense workers in Washington, D.C. Strike is over pay and benefits.

news.title: Why weak jobs data means investors should cut back bets on big U.S. tech names
news.summary: The Fed cutting rates tends to see the equalweighted S&P 500 outperform, Jefferies says. The Fed also tends to cut interest rates at a faster pace than other major central banks.

news.title: Denim in the dining room? Some luxury cruise travelers say they’re not on board with the idea.
news.summary: CNN.com will feature iReporter photos in a weekly Travel Snapshots gallery. Visit CNN.com/Travel each week for a new gallery of snapshots.

news.title: Tyson’s chicken business is growing, while beef is losing money even as prices jump
news.summary: Tyson’s stock rises as earnings beat expectations, as strength in the chicken business offset weakness in beef. Tyson shares are up 1.7% to $50.50.

news.title: Wayfair’s stock surges as a sales beat points to a recovery in the furniture market
news.summary: Shares of Wayfair are climbing toward the highest prices seen in more than a year. Wayfair's earnings beat expectations, sending its share price to a record high.

news.title: Elon Musk to get $29 billion richer after pay package approved. Tesla’s stock jumps.
news.summary: CEO Elon Musk's pay package was approved. That could boost his stake in the company to more than 500 million shares. Tesla’s stock was set to climb Monday.
